#install.packages('R.utils')
library(R.utils)

extractData <- function()
{   
    compressedFile <- 'repdata-data-StormData.csv'
    extractedFile  <- 'temporary/repdata-data-StormData.csv'
    
    if (!file.exists(extractedFile))
    {
        bunzip2(
            filename  = compressedFile,
            destname  = extractedFile, 
            remove    = FALSE, 
            overwrite = FALSE
        )
    }

    
}

extractData()
